com.aliceapps.custompreferences.listPreference

Class CustomListPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.preference.Preference
      • androidx.preference.DialogPreference
        • androidx.preference.ListPreference
          • com.aliceapps.custompreferences.listPreference.CustomListPreference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<androidx.preference.Preference>

    public class CustomListPreference
extends androidx.preference.ListPreference
    CustomListPreference shows custom ListPreference dialog CustomListPreference works the same way as ListPreference, but shows custom dialog with custom layout How to use it in preferences.xml file:

    Custom dialog layout must contain the following views: TextView R.id.settings_list_dialog_title - will be used to show title RecyclerView R.id.settings_list_dialog_recycler_view - will be used to show list of items Button R.id.settings_list_dialog_negative_button - negative (Cancel) button

    Custom list item layout must contain the following views: CheckedTextView R.id.settings_list_item - checkbox with text

    Preference layout has the same structure as ListPreference layout, must contain: TextView @android:id/title - will be used to show title TextView @android:id/summary - will be used to show summary

    Version:
    07.09.2020
    Author:
    alice.apps
